alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:46PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Washington and northeastern Baker Counties through 615 PM MDT/515 PM PDT/... At 545 PM MDT/445 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sweedes Landing, or 24 miles north of Weiser, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 40 mph, half inch hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could cause localized flooding. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brownlee Reservoir around 550 PM MDT. Halfway around 510 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
